headline: Why Monolithic Power Systems Rallied Today
summary: Monolithic was beaten down in November on fears of market share losses in its high-growth artificial intelligence (AI) segment.  The power and heat burdens on artificial intelligence chips has grown in recent years, making the AI segment the biggest growth driver for Monolithic over the past couple of years.  Edgewater noted the problem appeared to occur at higher-watt levels required of the B200 and GB200 modules, but that Monolithic could maintain share at the lower-power B300A module.

headline: Citigroup & JPMorgan Expect Q4 IB and Market Revenues to Rise
summary: C and JPM project IB and market revenues to grow in the fourth quarter of 2024. The banks also provide new and updated guidance for revenues and expenses.

headline: Citi Wealth Releases Outlook 2025 - Growth Amid Discord: Strategies for a "Rule-Breaking" Expansion
summary: NEW YORK, December 11, 2024--Today, Citi Wealth released its full-year Wealth Outlook for 2025 – Growth Amid Discord: Strategies for a "Rule-Breaking" Expansion. The report offers detailed perspectives on the global economic, market and geopolitical landscape ahead.
